name: Shakir
text: I swear by those who draw themselves out in ranks

name: Shakir
text: Then those who drive away with reproof,

name: Shakir
text: Then those who recite, being mindful,

name: Shakir
text: Most surely your Allah is One:

name: Shakir
text: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, and Lord of the easts.

name: Shakir
text: Surely We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment, the stars,

name: Shakir
text: And (there is) a safeguard against every rebellious Shaitan.

name: Shakir
text: They cannot listen to the exalted assembly and they are thrown at from every side,

name: Shakir
text: Being driven off, and for them is a perpetual chastisement,

name: Shakir
text: Except him who snatches off but once, then there follows him a brightly shining flame.

name: Shakir
text: Then ask them whether they are stronger in creation or those (others) whom We have created. Surely We created them of firm clay.

name: Shakir
text: Nay! you wonder while they mock,

name: Shakir
text: And when they are reminded, they mind not,

name: Shakir
text: And when they see a sign they incite one another to scoff,

name: Shakir
text: And they say: This is nothing but clear magic:

name: Shakir
text: What! when we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then certainly be raised,

name: Shakir
text: Or our fathers of yore?

name: Shakir
text: Say: Aye! and you shall be abject.

name: Shakir
text: So it shall only be a single cry, when lo! they shall see.

name: Shakir
text: And they shall say: O woe to us! this is the day of requital.

name: Shakir
text: This is the day of the judgment which you called a lie.

name: Shakir
text: Gather together those who were unjust and their associates, and what they used to worship

name: Shakir
text: Besides Allah, then lead them to the way to hell.

name: Shakir
text: And stop them, for they shall be questioned:

name: Shakir
text: What is the matter with you that you do not help each other?

name: Shakir
text: Nay! on that day they shall be submissive.

name: Shakir
text: And some of them shall advance towards others, questioning each other.

name: Shakir
text: They shall say: Surely you used to come to us from the right side.

name: Shakir
text: They shall say: Nay, you (yourselves) were not believers;

name: Shakir
text: And we had no authority over you, but you were an inordinate people;

name: Shakir
text: So the sentence of our Lord has come to pass against us: (now) we shall surely taste;

name: Shakir
text: So we led you astray, for we ourselves were erring.

name: Shakir
text: So they shall on that day be sharers in the chastisement one with another.

name: Shakir
text: Surely thus do We deal with the guilty.

name: Shakir
text: Surely they used to behave proudly when it was said to them: There is no god but Allah;

name: Shakir
text: And to say: What! shall we indeed give up our gods for the sake of a mad poet?

name: Shakir
text: Nay: he has come with the truth and verified the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely you will taste the painful punishment.

name: Shakir
text: And you shall not be rewarded except (for) what you did.

name: Shakir
text: Save the servants of Allah, the purified ones.

name: Shakir
text: For them is a known sustenance,

name: Shakir
text: Fruits, and they shall be highly honored,

name: Shakir
text: In gardens of pleasure,

name: Shakir
text: On thrones, facing each other.

name: Shakir
text: A bowl shall be made to go round them from water running out of springs,

name: Shakir
text: White, delicious to those who drink.

name: Shakir
text: There shall be no trouble in it, nor shall they be exhausted therewith.

name: Shakir
text: And with them shall be those who restrain the eyes, having beautiful eyes;

name: Shakir
text: As if they were eggs carefully protected.

name: Shakir
text: Then shall some of them advance to others, questioning each other.

name: Shakir
text: A speaker from among them shall say: Surely I had a comrade of mine,

name: Shakir
text: Who said: What! are you indeed of those who accept (the truth)?

name: Shakir
text: What! when we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then be certainly brought to judgment?

name: Shakir
text: He shall say: Will you look on?

name: Shakir
text: Then he looked down and saw him in the midst of hell.

name: Shakir
text: He shall say: By Allah! you had almost caused me to perish;

name: Shakir
text: And had it not been for the favor of my Lord, I would certainly have been among those brought up.

name: Shakir
text: Is it then that we are not going to die,

name: Shakir
text: Except our previous death? And we shall not be chastised?

name: Shakir
text: Most surely this is the mighty achievement.

name: Shakir
text: For the like of this then let the workers work.

name: Shakir
text: Is this better as an entertainment or the tree of Zaqqum?

name: Shakir
text: Surely We have made it to be a trial to the unjust.

name: Shakir
text: Surely it is a tree that-grows in the bottom of the hell;

name: Shakir
text: Its produce is as it were the heads of the serpents.

name: Shakir
text: Then most surely they shall eat of it and fill (their) bellies with it.

name: Shakir
text: Then most surely they shall have after it to drink of a mixture prepared in boiling water.

name: Shakir
text: Then most surely their return shall be to hell.

name: Shakir
text: Surely they found their fathers going astray,

name: Shakir
text: So in their footsteps they are being hastened on.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly most of the ancients went astray before them,

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We sent among them warners.

name: Shakir
text: Then see how was the end of those warned,

name: Shakir
text: Except the servants of Allah, the purified ones.

name: Shakir
text: And Nuh did certainly call upon Us, and most excellent answerer of prayer are We.

name: Shakir
text: And We delivered him and his followers from the mighty distress.

name: Shakir
text: And We made his offspring the survivors.

name: Shakir
text: And We perpetuated to him (praise) among the later generations.

name: Shakir
text: Peace and salutation to Nuh among the nations.

name: Shakir
text: Thus do We surely reward the doers of good.

name: Shakir
text: Surely he was of Our believing servants.

name: Shakir
text: Then We drowned the others

name: Shakir
text: And most surely Ibrahim followed his way.

name: Shakir
text: When he came to his Lord with a free heart,

name: Shakir
text: When he said to his father and his people: What is it that you worship?

name: Shakir
text: A lie-- gods besides Allah-- do you desire?

name: Shakir
text: What is then your idea about the Lord of the worlds?

name: Shakir
text: Then he looked at the stars, looking up once,

name: Shakir
text: Then he said: Surely I am sick (of your worshipping these).

name: Shakir
text: So they went away from him, turning back.

name: Shakir
text: Then he turned aside to their gods secretly and said: What! do you not eat?

name: Shakir
text: What is the matter with you that you do not speak?

name: Shakir
text: Then he turned against them secretly, smiting them with the right hand.

name: Shakir
text: So they (people) advanced towards him, hastening.

name: Shakir
text: Said he: What! do you worship what you hew out?

name: Shakir
text: And Allah has created you and what you make.

name: Shakir
text: They said: Build for him a furnace, then cast him into the burning fire.

name: Shakir
text: And they desired a war against him, but We brought them low.

name: Shakir
text: And he said: Surely I fly to my lord; He will guide me.

name: Shakir
text: My Lord! grant me of the doers of good deeds.

name: Shakir
text: So We gave him the good news of a boy, possessing forbearance.

name: Shakir
text: And when he attained to working with him, he said: O my son! surely I have seen in a dream that I should sacrifice you; consider then what you see. He said: O my father! do what you are commanded; if Allah please, you will find me of the patient ones.

name: Shakir
text: So when they both submitted and he threw him down upon his forehead,

name: Shakir
text: And We called out to him saying: O Ibrahim!

name: Shakir
text: You have indeed shown the truth of the vision; surely thus do We reward the doers of good:

name: Shakir
text: Most surely this is a manifest trial.

name: Shakir
text: And We ransomed him with a Feat sacrifice.

name: Shakir
text: And We perpetuated (praise) to him among the later generations.

name: Shakir
text: Peace be on Ibrahim.

name: Shakir
text: Thus do We reward the doers of good.

name: Shakir
text: Surely he was one of Our believing servants.

name: Shakir
text: And We gave him the good news of Ishaq, a prophet among the good ones.

name: Shakir
text: And We showered Our blessings on him and on Ishaq; and of their offspring are the doers of good, and (also) those who are clearly unjust to their own souls.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We conferred a favor on Musa and Haroun.

name: Shakir
text: And We delivered them both and their people from the mighty distress.

name: Shakir
text: And We helped them, so they were the vanquishers.

name: Shakir
text: And We gave them both the Book that made (things) clear.

name: Shakir
text: And We guided them both on the right way.

name: Shakir
text: And We perpetuated (praise) to them among the later generations.

name: Shakir
text: Peace be on Musa and Haroun.

name: Shakir
text: Even thus do We reward the doers of good.

name: Shakir
text: Surely they were both of Our believing servants.

name: Shakir
text: And Ilyas was most surely of the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: When he said to his people: Do you not guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: What! do you call upon Ba'l and forsake the best of the creators,

name: Shakir
text: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of yore?

name: Shakir
text: But they called him a liar, therefore they shall most surely be brought up.

name: Shakir
text: But not the servants of Allah, the purified ones.

name: Shakir
text: And We perpetuated to him (praise) among the later generations.

name: Shakir
text: Peace be on Ilyas.

name: Shakir
text: Even thus do We reward the doers of good.

name: Shakir
text: Surely he was one of Our believing servants.

name: Shakir
text: And Lut was most surely of the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: When We delivered him and his followers, all--

name: Shakir
text: Except an old woman (who was) amongst those who tarried.

name: Shakir
text: Then We destroyed the others.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely you pass by them in the morning,

name: Shakir
text: And at night; do you not then understand?

name: Shakir
text: And Yunus was most surely of the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: When he ran away to a ship completely laden,

name: Shakir
text: So he shared (with them), but was of those who are cast off.

name: Shakir
text: So the fish swallowed him while he did that for which he blamed himself

name: Shakir
text: But had it not been that he was of those who glorify (Us),

name: Shakir
text: He would certainly have tarried in its belly to the day when they are raised.

name: Shakir
text: Then We cast him on to the vacant surface of the earth while he was sick.

name: Shakir
text: And We caused to grow up for him a gourdplant.

name: Shakir
text: And We sent him to a hundred thousand, rather they exceeded.

name: Shakir
text: And they believed, so We gave them provision till a time.

name: Shakir
text: Then ask them whether your Lord has daughters and they have sons.

name: Shakir
text: Or did We create the angels females while they were witnesses?

name: Shakir
text: Now surely it is of their own lie that they say:

name: Shakir
text: Allah has begotten; and most surely they are liars.

name: Shakir
text: Has He chosen daughters in preference to sons?

name: Shakir
text: What is the matter with you, how is it that you judge?

name: Shakir
text: Will you not then mind?

name: Shakir
text: Or have you a clear authority?

name: Shakir
text: Then bring your book, if you are truthful.

name: Shakir
text: And they assert a relationship between Him and the jinn; and certainly the jinn do know that they shall surely be brought up;

name: Shakir
text: Glory be to Allah (for freedom) from what they describe;

name: Shakir
text: But not so the servants of Allah, the purified ones.

name: Shakir
text: So surely you and what you worship,

name: Shakir
text: Not against Him can you cause (any) to fall into trial,

name: Shakir
text: Save him who will go to hell.

name: Shakir
text: And there is none of us but has an assigned place,

name: Shakir
text: And most surely we are they who draw themselves out in ranks,

name: Shakir
text: And we are most surely they who declare the glory (of Allah).

name: Shakir
text: And surely they used to say:

name: Shakir
text: Had we a reminder from those of yore,

name: Shakir
text: We would certainly have been the servants of Allah-- the purified ones.

name: Shakir
text: But (now) they disbelieve in it, so they will come to know.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly Our word has already gone forth in respect of Our servants, the apostles:

name: Shakir
text: Most surely they shall be the assisted ones

name: Shakir
text: And most surely Our host alone shall be the victorious ones.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore turn away from them till a time,

name: Shakir
text: And (then) see them, so they too shall see.

name: Shakir
text: What! would they then hasten on Our chastisement?

name: Shakir
text: But when it shall descend in their court, evil shall then be the morning of the warned ones.

name: Shakir
text: And turn away from them till a time

name: Shakir
text: And (then) see, for they too shall see.

name: Shakir
text: Glory be to your Lord, the Lord of Honor, above what they describe.

name: Shakir
text: And peace be on the apostles.

name: Shakir
text: And all praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
